name: node-js-express-upload-download-files
description: Node.js Express Rest APIs to Upload/Download Files

scripts.generate: openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:4096 -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_pubexp:3 -out keys/privateKey.pem && openssl pkey -in keys/privateKey.pem -out keys/publicKey.pem -pubout

author: bezkoder
